Clockwork Soldiers

spell id [id]: 854

Summon Units:#2321 Clockwork Soldier x 5+[1/2 lvl]
This spell creates a few soldiers driven by magic clockwork. The clockwork allows for great speed for short periods, after which it must be rewound.
